message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $22,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is quite a bit higher for me.  Could you meet me at $19,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $19,000. I'd be willing to meet you at $14,000. Can you consider that?
